title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 621.1 - Eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 621.1 - Eligibility

State Regulations

Any trainee referred to and attending a training course
established in accordance with the provisions of article 23-A of the Labor Law
at a facility beyond commuting distance from his regular place of residence, and who establishes a temporary residence near such facility, shall be paid a
subsistence allowance for each day he stays overnight at that temporary
residence during the period of the training course. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
621.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
